index.index-par1: The search is performed on the beginning of the person's last name followed by their first name:
index.index-par2: "Mar" searches for all people whose last name starts with mar
index.index-par3: "Martin m" searches for all people named Martin whose first name starts with m
index.index-par4: It is possible to use the * character as a wildcard:
index.index-par5: "Mar* m" searches for all people whose last name starts with mar and whose first name starts with m
index.index-par6: For compound names, the separator between the particle and the name is not standardized, it may be a hyphen, a space, or an underscore. Use the * wildcard to cover all cases:
index.index-par7: le*corbusier covers lecorbusier, le corbusier, le-corbusier, and le_corbusier
index.index-par8: if your search is still unsuccessful, search for a part of the name, for example: *corbus
